about_the_game:
Welcome to Age of Enchantment, a thrilling blend of tower defense strategy and deckbuilding innovation!

In the realm of Alhambria, a once-peaceful land now faces an ancient evil reborn. As ominous shadows spread across the horizon, you must harness the power of arcane enchantments and strategic prowess to defend against hordes of undead and demonic adversaries. The various races of Alhambria must now come together to stand their ground and push back the Darkness.

  • Class-Inspired Towers: Draw upon archetypes from classic fantasy to build towers that reflect distinct combat roles. Choose from towers specializing in magic and physical damage as well as melee and ranged attacks. Each tower is modeled after iconic fantasy roles like powerful Wizards, swift Rangers, and stalwart Fighters. Create diverse combinations to exploit enemy weaknesses, ensuring no two defenses are ever the same.

  • Innovative Deckbuilding: Customize your strategy by building a deck of powerful cards, each offering unique abilities and synergies. Expand your arsenal at the Shop using currency earned during intense waves of combat

  • Dynamic Tower Defense: Experience classic tower defense mechanics with a twist. Place and upgrade towers strategically to fend off waves of enemies, each wave more formidable than the last.

  • Enchanting Powers: Enhance your towers with mystical enchants that amplify their strengths or unlock new tactical possibilities. Adapt your defenses on-the-fly to counter diverse enemy tactics.

  • Choose Your Path: Align with one of Alhambria's factions, each offering distinct advantages and strategies. Craft your defensive approach based on faction-specific abilities. Will you choose the righteous Humans, the savage Orcs, or the mystical Elves?


Prepare to test your strategic mettle in Age of Enchantment, where every decision could tip the balance between victory and defeat. Will you rise to become a legendary defender, or will Alhambria succumb to darkness once more?

short_description: Age of Enchantment is a tower defense deck-builder set in a classical Fantasy world. Build, upgrade, and enchant your towers with a variety of buffs while adding cards to your deck. Do you have what it takes to thwart the rising Evil?
